TopicTitle: Whats the best forum to discuss multiplayer KSP activities

Articles.Content:
Whats the best forum to discuss multiplayer KSP activities, challenges, projects?

I have been hanging out with the DarkMultiPlayer developer and he made a GameData sync function with automods clients.
So it makes having my own server fun. I am trying to find out what forum or subforum is best to go about finding other players to enjoy this with.

Any help, much appreciated!

Roleplaying (people pretending to be countries and companies) led to terrible arguments on the forum and had to be ruled off-limits. If that's what you mean, it would need to take place away from this forum. If you want to recruit players, we could move this thread to Kerbal Network for you. Or did you have something else in mind?

Welcome, @Diveyez.  A small fraction of KSP players use the multiplayer mods. (I am not among them.)  If you haven't already, look at the threads on the cooperative mulitplayer mods.

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/168271-162-luna-multiplayer-lmp-beta

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/71656-darkmultiplayer-0310-ksp-161

Those sub-forums are primarily intended for discussing the releases of (updated versions of) the mods, but it is the only place I can think of where people who use the cooperative mulitplayer mods would see a post.  Maybe someone has already mentioned in the last few pages of one of those threads, where people announce who is hosting multiplayer sessions.
